name: PDFreader4Android
body:
PDFreader
=========
is an Android application. It is a [clone of APV](https://code.google.com/p/apv/) which is based on the [MuPDF library](http://ghostscript.com/MuPDF.html).

***
**License**: [GPLv3](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/license-list.html#GNUGPLv3)
***
[About the Portable Document Format (PDF)](http://pdfreaders.org/os)
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
